# Bottomless Hate (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Ghostwalk (WotC), pg. 49

You fill yourself with a terrible hatred against your favored enemies. Against them you gain a +1 morale bonus on attack and damage rolls for every three caster levels. This spell is suppressed by spells such as *[[Calm Emotions (Spell)|calm emotions]]**.*
